responses: I am from the far far distant future, where your fate is sealed.
I cannot tell you exactly where, I am frmo, but I can tell you when...
I am from no place, and all places. I am inevitable.

patterns: what are the names of the berks
responses: The Berks are a magical set of rotters!
The Berks are Pip the scoundrel, Sammy the daft, Patrick the rotty, and Willy the div
The berks come in many forms; thick, daft, silly, and cold.
Many prophecised the berks return. Few belivied it to be true!
